column1: 'Scuse me, we need to borrow your squirrels.
Garrison, you have brought your filth to this town for the last time!
Move aside, kid! He must pay for his stand mixer.
What's ridiculous about hucking squirrels at a man who has angered the Economy?!
We demand you stop showing it!
Hey, I got an idea. Uh maybe we should all take off all our clothes, scramble into a big pile and start gettin' gay with each other.
